alert.note: Alert for Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 30 at 12:58PM CDT until May 01 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Iron County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the northwestern area of the Lac du Flambeau Band. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Much lower snowfall totals are expected near the shorelines of Lake Superior, including Saxon Harbor where a rain and snow mix is possible. This is expected to be a very heavy wet snowfall.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
